data:
There is a bug in 1.18.2 version that does not work properly in gofish mod. This patched go fish mod solves the problem.
I didn't create this mod, I'm just uploading the patched mod that someone else created.
I uploaded this mode to put it in my modpack. If there is a problem, I will delete the project immediately.

Original mod link
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/go-fish

Original patched file link
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zNOF_Knmdci9--_k9cmQA5rmRmvhnMTM/view?usp=sharing
